article:
'Specification' may refer to several different concepts:

* Specification (technical standard), an explicit set of requirements
* Specification (legal concept), from Roman Law
* Specification (regression), the practice of translating theory into a model
  for regression analysis
* Specification language, for describing a computer software design at a
  high level
* Regional specification, identifying different areas of the early embryo
  in biology
* Patent specification, part of a patent application
